CONTENT: Bring soap, scrubber to clean the fish tank so we can reinstall it in the coop.
DESCRIPTION: This also ensures it won’t shatter and leave dangerous glass shards around.

CONTENT: Cut the cement board from the top of the door above the chicken coop.

CONTENT: Enclose the chicken run so predators can't get in.
DESCRIPTION: This ensures we don't waste our time by working to earn money to buy more chickens. Also ensures we can begin to have hatchlings and sell them to pay for the chickens we've bought.

CONTENT: Using Spencer's design install a huge feeder onto the chicken coop.

CONTENT: Cut down the tree near and in the chicken coop.
